data.title: Deals we advised on – CapitalChange
data.text:
Red Urban to Omnicom/ DDB

Red Urban is one of the leading interactive communication agencies in the Benelux. CapitalChange advised the owners of Red Urban in their sale to the company to (a subsidiary of) Omnicom.

Satama Interactive to Lost Boys

Satama Interactive Netherlands is one of the leading developers of interactive solutions in the Netherlands. CapitalChange advised the shareholders of the company in the sale to Lost Boys/ LBICon.

MarketScan to Solera

CapitalChange advised the owners of MarketScan to the Solera Inc. MarketScan is one of the leading data processing and analytics company in the Dutch Market. Solera is a global leader in automotive and other insurance calculations and data processing.

significant share in Agradi to an Investor

Agradis one of the leading online retailers in pet and animal related products. CapitalChange advised the shareholders in acquiring an additional, active, investor.

MPS to Braver Investments

MPS develops and build large, commercial label printers. CapitalChange advised the shareholder in the sale of a majority interest to Braver Investments.

Trimergo to NedVest

Trimergo is a leading provider of Project Management solutions. CapitalChange advised the shareholders in a sale to an investment entity held by NedVest.

Amarcon to ABB

CapitalChange advised the owners of Amarcon in the sale of all outstanding shares to the ABB. Amarcon is a Netherlands based global leader in software for nautical operation support . ABB is a global provider of advanced technological solutions.

3T to Oost NL

CapitalChange advised the owner of 3T in the sale of all outstanding shares to the Management and Oost NL. 3T is a leading provider of advanced embedded software solutions.

Autodata to Solera

Autodata is one of the leading providers of automotive data processing and analytics applications in the Dutch Market. Solera is a global leader in automotive and other insurance calculations and data processing. CapitalChange advised Solera in the acquisition of Autodata.

Aeronamic to Oost NL

Aeronamic is one of the worlds leading producers of aircraft (sub) components and systems. CapitalChange advised the all shareholders of Aeronamic in the sale of a minority stake held by Oost NL to the fellow shareholders.

Kiwa Carity to Zorg Invest

Kiwa Carity is one of the leading patient reference data providers in the Netherlands. CapitalChange advised the shareholders of the company in a sale to Zorg Invest.

Public placement of certificate of shares HyGear on NPEX

HyGear is one of the global leaders in systems producing Hydrogen and other gasses. CapitalChange advised the company in raising growth equity by a public placement on NPEX.

Colimbra to Solera

Colimbra is one of the leading providers of insurance data processing and analytics applications in the Dutch Market. Solera is a global leader in automotive and other insurance calculations and data processing. CapitalChange advised Solera in the acquisition of Colimbra.

Autosoft to Solera

The Italie based Autosoft is one of Europe’s leading providers of automotive (repair) data. Solera is a global leader in automotive and other insurance calculations and data processing. CapitalChange advised Solera in the acquisition of Autosoft.

Kokoro to Makerstreet

Kokoro is a specialized advertising agency. CapitalChange advised the shareholders in a sale of the shares to the Amsterdam based Makerstreet.

Public placement by HyGear of a subordinated bond on NPEX

HyGear is one of the global leaders in systems producing Hydrogen and other gasses. CapitalChange advised the company in placing a subordinated bond on NPEX.

minority share ATG Europe to MBI team

ATG provides engineering staffing to the most demand aerospace and aeronautical clients in Europe. CapitalChange advised the shareholders in raising funding as well sale to a specialized MBI team.

majority share in Bloomville to Oost NL

Bloomville provides training and education solutions to the corporate market. CapitalChange Oost Capital in the sale of a majority stake to the management and investors.

Geervliet Cardiologie to Cardiologie Centra Nederland

Geervliet is a highly specialized cardiology clinic. CapitalChange advised the stakeholders in a transfer to Cardiologie Centra Nederland.

You Improve to 2 Dimensions

You Improve advises its clients in achieving and maintaining operational excellence. CapitalChange advised the management in achieving a Management Buy-Out of all outstanding shares.
